vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.2;
son of: Haroeh (H7204);
father of: Ahumai (H0267) and Lahad (H3855)
§ Jahath = "He will snatch up"
1) son of Reaiah and grandson of Shobal of the tribe of Judah
2) a son of Libni and grandson of Gershom and great grandson of Levi
3) a Gershonite Levite; the eldest son of Shimei and the grandson of Laadan; founder of the house of Jahath
4) a Levite and son of Shelomoth
5) a Merarite Levite in the reign of Josiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Reaías; tribu de Judá; (b)   hijo de Libní; descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví; (c)   descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   descendiente de Ishar; tribu de Leví; (e)   descendiente de Merarí; tribu de Leví; en tiempos del rey Josías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅哈 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他要搶奪"
1) 猶大的孫子 (代上 4:2)
2) 數位同名的利未人
2a) 利未的曾孫, 革順的孫子, 立尼的兒子 (代上 6:20)
2b) 利未人示每的長子 (代上 23:10,11)
2c) 利未人, 示羅摩的後代 (代上 24:22)
2d) 約西亞時代,米拉利家的利未人 (代下 34:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅哈 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他要抢夺"
1) 犹大的孙子 (代上 4:2)
2) 数位同名的利未人
2a) 利未的曾孙, 革顺的孙子, 立尼的儿子 (代上 6:20)
2b) 利未人示每的长子 (代上 23:10,11)
2c) 利未人, 示罗摩的后代 (代上 24:22)
2d) 约西亚时代,米拉利家的利未人 (代下 34:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.20;
son of: Libni (H3845);
brother of: Ladan (H3936I), Shimei (H8096W);
father of: Zimmah (H2155); also called Shimei at 1Ch.6.42;
Also named: shim.i (שִׁמְעִי "Shimei" H8096V)
§ Jahath = "He will snatch up"
1) son of Reaiah and grandson of Shobal of the tribe of Judah
2) a son of Libni and grandson of Gershom and great grandson of Levi
3) a Gershonite Levite; the eldest son of Shimei and the grandson of Laadan; founder of the house of Jahath
4) a Levite and son of Shelomoth
5) a Merarite Levite in the reign of Josiah

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.10;
son of: Shimei (H8096);
brother of: Zina (H2126), Jeush (H3266J) and Beriah (H1283J)
§ Jahath = "He will snatch up"
1) son of Reaiah and grandson of Shobal of the tribe of Judah
2) a son of Libni and grandson of Gershom and great grandson of Levi
3) a Gershonite Levite; the eldest son of Shimei and the grandson of Laadan; founder of the house of Jahath
4) a Levite and son of Shelomoth
5) a Merarite Levite in the reign of Josiah

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.22;
son of: Shelomith (H8019A)
§ Jahath = "He will snatch up"
1) son of Reaiah and grandson of Shobal of the tribe of Judah
2) a son of Libni and grandson of Gershom and great grandson of Levi
3) a Gershonite Levite; the eldest son of Shimei and the grandson of Laadan; founder of the house of Jahath
4) a Levite and son of Shelomoth
5) a Merarite Levite in the reign of Josiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.17;
son of: Gershon (H1648);
brother of: Shimei (H8096);
father of: Jahath (H3189H), Ladan (H3936I), Shimei (H8096W); also called Jahath at 1Ch.6.43; Ladan (KJV: Laadan) at 1Ch.23.7,9; 26.21;
Another name of liv.ni (לִבְנִי "Libni" H3845)
§ Jahath = "He will snatch up"
1) son of Reaiah and grandson of Shobal of the tribe of Judah
2) a son of Libni and grandson of Gershom and great grandson of Levi
3) a Gershonite Levite; the eldest son of Shimei and the grandson of Laadan; founder of the house of Jahath
4) a Levite and son of Shelomoth
5) a Merarite Levite in the reign of Josiah
